notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription: 1-Phenyl-2-butene has an ultraviolet absorption at λmax = 208 nm (ε = 8000). On treatment with a small amount of strong acid, isomerization occurs and a new substance with λmax = 250 nm (ε = 15,800) is formed. Propose a structure for this isomer, and suggest a mechanism for its formation.
